name: Perfecting the Art of Brewing a Moka Pot
description: Master the art of Italian Moka Pot brewing in this hands-on session led by coffee pros. Learn grind size, water ratios, and technique to craft bold, barista-level coffee at home

name: Screening of Mohan Lal's "Vanaprastham"

location.name: Untitled Arts Foundation, JP Nagar
location.address: Untitled Arts Foundation, JP Nagar Bangalore

description: Set in 1930s Travancore, Vanaprastham follows a Kathakali artist caught between caste, art, and identity. Shaji N. Karun crafts a haunting tale of performance, longing, and blurred realities

name: Supper@Lavelle
description: Former physicist Kiran and ex-IRS officer Ankita left their careers to chase a culinary dream. Now they run a Bangalore restaurant and host Supper@Lavelle, a cozy, community-driven dining experience

name: Arinjoy Trio Live Performance
description: The Arinjoy Trio, led by guitarist-vocalist Arinjoy Sarkar, brings its searing blend of Chicago blues, rock, and R&B to Windmills—an electrifying act shaping India’s contemporary blues scene.

name: TRINITY SERIES - BANGALORE
description: Allstars Studio hosts a 3-day choreography intensive at ARDS, Bangalore, offering dancers an immersive dive into technique, movement dynamics, and collaborative learning in a vibrant, open setting.

name: Jensen Interceptor
description: Jansen Interceptor, the Australian DJ and co-founder of International Chrome, brings his signature electro sound to The Burrow, joined by Watashi b2b XS and Soiri for a genre-bending underground set

name: Say it like you meme it!

location.name: Museum of Art & Photography, Kasturba Road
location.address: Museum of Art & Photography, Kasturba Road Bangalore

description: Explore whimsical 19th- and 20th-century textile labels—think dancing elephants and egg-women—in Ticket Tika Chaap, followed by a hands-on meme-making session blending history with digital creativity

name: Wake Up Sid!
description: Chapter 6 of Club Sunset Cinema brings Wake Up Sid! to an open-air screen—a breezy ode to youth, city dreams, and Ranbir Kapoor, wrapped in the glow of starlit nostalgia

name: Sundae Sunday
description: Thai artist SUNDAY SUNDAE takes the stage bringing genre-blending sets marked by rich textures and sonic depth, joined by @sundaysundaemusic for a curated night of immersive sound

name: Mary My Darling
description: Mary My Darling at The Koramangala Club explores love and betrayal through a taut script and compelling performances, offering a gripping, emotionally layered portrait of human relationships

name: Coffee & Connections: A Mother-child Experience
description: Coffee & Connections offers a creative space for mothers and children, blending storytelling, coffee painting, and mosaic-making into a warm, art-filled morning of bonding and playful exploration.

name: The House Blue
description: A photo exhibition reflects on the idea of home—its form, fragility, and absence—through evocative visuals that examine how memory and space shape our sense of belonging

name: Link's Climate Network Connect

location.name: BLR design centre, Church Street
location.address: BLR design centre, Church Street Bangalore

description: Link hosts a climate event on May 10 at BLR Design Centre with Ajita Madan of NthAdventure discussing sustainable travel, followed by a Climate Fresk workshop led by Mehar Zariwala

name: Sound healing with Tibetian singing bowls and Didgeridoo
description: A sound healing session offers a restorative reset, using vibrations to ease stress, release emotional blockages, and activate the parasympathetic nervous system

name: Cyanotype Workshop
description: Praxis Technē hosts a cyanotype workshop blending art, science, and history. Learn to create striking blueprints on fabric and paper using film negatives and natural objects

name: Le Manguier
description: Le Manguier at HumbleBean Concept Café, celebrates mango season with French pâtisserie and globally inspired savouries—offering choux, tarts, and more rooted in seasonal, sensory craft
